text: Ján Zachara (27 August 1928 – 2 January 2025) was a Czechoslovak boxer who won the gold medal in the featherweight division at the 1952 Summer Olympics in Helsinki. He was born in Kubrá, a borough of Trenčín, present-day Slovakia. Zachara died on 2 January 2025, at the age of 96. ==References== Category:1928 births Category:2025 deaths Category:Olympic gold medalists for Czechoslovakia Category:Boxers
title: Ján Zachara
